QuestData.Title: A Fel Whip For Gahk
QuestData.Description: Gahk think being smart is dumb sometimes. Gahk not want to think. Me want little $r to smash big demons!$B$BDey have some chiefs, and da chiefs all have whips to hurt da little demons. You bring Gahk a whip!$B$BYou challenge demon chief in forge camps at burning, green, fel crystal prism. Use 35 apexis shards to get dem to come. Dey called Galvanoth, Braxxus, Zarcsin and da Mo'arg Incinerator.
QuestData.RewardText: Gahk like whip. Maybe Gahk take whip and beat demons with it!$B$BMe say to $r that $r summon demon chiefs anytime $r have friends and many shards.
